text: Jacksonian democracy is an era in the history of the United States. It started when president Jackson was elected in 1828, and it ended about 25 years later. Jackson did a number of reforms: * The right to vote in elections was given to all white males over age 21; beforehand it had been limited to white landowners. * The power of the US government was cut back * Lassez-faire: the economy will regulate itself, and needs little intervention Category:19th century in the United States
title: Jacksonian democracy
